# Appendix B / Station Assignments by HUC #

The station assignments by HUC shown in this appendix are included in the ***Combined Inputs*** worksheet of the control file.
The following list was created on June 30, 2015 but may become out-of-date as CWCB and DWR revise the Colorado SWSI analysis.

**This documentatino will be replaced by an auto-generated file.**
